events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position at our company and appreciate your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster based on your experience and skills listed in the resume.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will be in contact to guide you through the next steps.
The initial phone screening was successfully completed, discussing your technical background and suitability for the Software Engineer role.
You responded promptly and positively to the interview scheduling request, confirming your availability for the technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for April 20th at 10 AM UTC, where you will meet with our senior engineering team members.
